title: How to determine what technology a website is built on - Quora

response.answer_text: You can use lead databases to collect such data about technologies used on different business websites - which is often needed for B2B SaaS products to compile a highly targeted list of their prospects based on using some technology on their websites. For example, Uplead lead database allows you to build such targeted lists of prospects based on the technology stack of companies and contacts listed in their database.The system tracks over 16,000 technologies like analytics, CRM, marketing automation tools, etc.For example, If you want to find organizations that use WordPress or some other CMS, you can easily build a list of those companies. Here is how its interface looks like: What Are Technographics & How to Target Accounts Using Technology  This tool can make your firmographic data more robust and is especially effective for a SaaS product, as you can easily identify the customers of your biggest competitors - these data allows you to answer questions about your prospects and competitors like: What hardware or software do your target audience use?Do they have remarketing technology installed on their website?Do they use a marketing stack or all-in-one marketing automation?

hmmmmm… How does a carpenter determine what tools to build a chair? How does a mechanic determine what tools to repair a car? How do you determine what technology a website is built on? Answer to all: It depends on what you want, the scale of what you want, how fast you want it and others. You want to pop up a simple portfolio site with zero experience Free Website Builder | Create a Free Website | Wix.com Want to set up a blog asap WordPress.com: Create a Free Website or Blog Oh… u need an e-commerce store up an running by the end of the day Start, grow, and scale your business - Shopify U need a e-commerce store more robust but still light weight, you decide to build one to suite your unique needs. php- Hypertext Preprocessor with laravel framework The PHP Framework For Web Artisans oh i need an even bigger e-commerce store…u know what, i want to sell an e-commerce platform…u start thinking enterprise ASP.NET | Open-source web framework for .NET , Java | Oracle etc… and it just keeps going… So, It depends. Hope you get the idea…
